page.title: 03LANGWORTH VILLAGE
page.content:
{ LANGWORTH VILLAGE
In {Langworth}it is very quiet and it is very nice.Sometimes when you open your curtains, you can see{Lincoln Cathedral.There is always something to do.Often people go bird-watching down at the gravel pits.In our village there is a main road.It leads from {Lincoln}to{Skegness}.There are lots of woodlands and farmlands surrounding the village.In{Langworth}there is an Anglican Church which is known as St.Hugh's.There are two shops.One is called Oswin's,freshly baked bread is available there.The other shop is a general store and Post Office.There is a Public House at either end of this linear village.
